zcuras.js.en# Invitation to Tender: Recipient/Contribution Agreement Compliance Audit
=========

### Tender Number and Reference
PW-22-01006738

### Tender Opening Date and Time
The tender closing date and time was 2022-09-23T14:00:00.

### Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) notice.

### Notice Type (French)
Ce sont des Avis de Proposition (AP)

### Procurement Category
SRV (Services)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering (Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif)

### Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)
R010A ( Internal and External Audits (Supply Arrangement PASS))

### End-User Entity
Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (Citoyenneté et Immigration Canada)

### End-User Address
235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0H5

### Tender Description
Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada seeks a contract for the Recipient/Contribution Agreement Compliance Audit service under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement. The contract will cover a period of 6 months with two 1-year option periods, and the services will be provided on an “as-and-when- requested” basis.

### Contracting Entity
Citizenship and Immigration Canada (Cutoyenneté et Immigration Canada)

### Contact Person
Dominique Sweet  
 Email: dominique.sweet@cic.gc.ca
